title: If I get some money from a friend and use it for Haram, is there any sin on HIM? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Manas from Qatar Assalamu Alaikum Sheikh Wa Alaikumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh Sheikh if I get some money from my friend and if I use it for haram, will he be sinful? And if so, if I ask for forgiveness, is that enough? The money you got, was it a gift or a loan? No, I just asked him for money, he gave it to me. So it's a gift? Yes. He doesn't know what you're going to do with it? No, he doesn't. No, whatever you do with it, he has no sin on him at all.
